name: Unearthed Pit
description:
Thank you so much for your interest in my solo-dev project inspired by the game of my childhood "Motherload" from XGen Studios developed in Unreal Engine 5. This game is currently in the early stage of development and for any suggestions or bug reports, I thank you greatly.

In "Unearthed Pit" take remote control of your drilling machine and collect rare minerals to sell them and upgrade your vehicle. But be careful not to run out of fuel!

Currently completed:

  • Procedurally generated map
  • 8 different minerals and 1 treasure
  • The core gameplay and save system
  • Vehicle upgrades

To do:

  • Adding more minerals, treasures, and upgrades
  • Damage system and traps
  • Power-ups
  • Appearance Customisation
  • Storyline
  • Employee hiring system
  • Building and upgrading facilities
  • Melting and manufacturing items
  • Full gamepad support
  • ...and more!
